Reference

Activity Data

Data from Apple and Google.

apple_mobility

Apple Mobility Data

google_mobility

Google Mobility Data

CDC Data

Data from the Centers for Disease Control’s surveillance network.

cdc_catchments

CDC surveillance network and network catchment area

cdc_deaths_by_age

CDC Surveillance Network Death Counts by Age

cdc_deaths_by_sex

CDC provisional death counts by sex

cdc_deaths_by_state

CDC provisional death counts by state

cdc_deaths_by_week

CDC Provisional death counts by week

cdc_hospitalizations

CDC Laboratory Confirmed COVID-19-Associated Hospitalization in the US

nssp_covid_er_nat

NSSP National COVID-related ER Visits

nssp_covid_er_reg

NSSP Regional COVID ER Visits

COVID Tracking Project

US State-level Data from the COVID Tracking Project.

covus

COVID-19 data for the USA, current as of Monday, July 20, 2020

covus_race

COVID-19 case and death counts for the USA by race and state current as of Monday, July 20, 2020

covus_ethnicity

COVID-19 case and death counts for the USA by Hispanic/Non-Hispanic ethnicity and state current as of Monday, July 20, 2020

ECDC Data

Cross-national Data from the European Centers for Disease Control.

covnat

International COVID-19 cases and deaths, current as of Monday, July 20, 2020

Human Mortality Database Data

Short-Term Mortality Fluctuations Data from the HMD.

stmf

Short Term Mortality Fluctuations (STMF) data series

US National Center for Health Statistics

Reports from the NCHS on the age and racial/ethnic composition of COVID victims

nchs_pud

COVID-19 Case Surveillance Public Use Data

nchs_sas

Provisional COVID-19 Death Counts by Sex, Age, and State

nchs_wss

Provisional Death Counts for Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19): Weekly State-Specific Data Updates

New York Times Data

Data from the New York Times.

nytcovcounty

NYT COVID-19 data for US counties, current as of Monday, July 20, 2020

nytcovstate

NYT COVID-19 data for the US states, current as of Monday, July 20, 2020

nytexcess

NYT Excess Mortality Estimates, current as of Monday, July 20, 2020

nytcovus

NYT COVID-19 data for the US, current as of Monday, July 20, 2020

Policy Data

Cross-national Data from the Coronanet project.

coronanet

CoronaNet Government Response Project data

Other

Other useful tables

countries

Country Names and ISO codes

uspop

State population estimates for US States
